abstract.t: The goal of Application-Layer Traffic Optimization (ALTO) is toprovide guidance to applications, which have to select one or severalhosts from a set of candidates that are able to provide a desiredresource.Entities seeking guidance need to discover and possibly select anALTO server to ask. This is called ALTO server discovery. This memodescribes an ALTO server discovery mechanism based on severalalternative mechanisms that are applicable in a diverse set of ALTOdeployments.
